summary: A test suite that uses a mocked AWS environment to verify the behavior of AWS Glue DataBrew recipe operations, including creation, deletion, description, listing, publishing, and updating, as well as handling of edge cases such as duplicate names, invalid versions, and pagination.
business_intent: Validate that DataBrew recipe management APIs function correctly and robustly, ensuring reliable data preparation workflows and proper error handling in applications that rely on AWS Glue DataBrew.
